queries.query: all:("scientific discovery" OR "knowledge discovery" OR "scientific literature analysis" OR "research trend analysis") AND all:("large language models" OR "LLMs") AND all:("autonomous agent" OR "AI agent")

ti:("review" OR "survey") AND abs:("large language models" AND "scientific literature" AND "trend analysis" AND "knowledge discovery")
all:("self-correction" OR "self-critique" OR "iterative refinement") AND all:("LLM" OR "large language model") AND all:("reasoning") AND all:("scientific analysis")
all:("knowledge representation" OR "knowledge extraction" OR "relation extraction") AND all:("scientific text" OR "biomedical text") AND all:("LLM" OR "large language model")
